cards.SpecialAbility: If blocking and another Assyrian is in play, you may negate and discard a card in a territory (except a character).

cards.Name: Huge Egyptian (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: You may discard a Hero from a deck. You may take an evil O.T. weapon from discard pile.

cards.Name: King Sargon II (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: You may play an evil O.T. Fortress from deck. You may capture an evil human in a territory.

cards.Name: Pharaoh Shishak (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: Negate protect abilities. May band to an Egyptian. Cannot be prevented.

cards.Name: User of Curious Arts (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: May use evil Enhancements of a selected brigade. Cannot be negated.

cards.Name: Assyrian Survivor (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: Protect this card from discard abilities used by opponent. If defeated, capture this card to opponent instead.

cards.Name: Joseph in Prison (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: Interrupt the battle. Banish all cards in battle.

cards.Name: Two Thousand Horses (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: You may draw X (limit 2). If 3 or more Heroes are in battle, you may play an O.T. pale green Enhancement.

cards.Name: Mask of Fear (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: Interrupt the battle. You may draw 3 and play an evil Enhancement.

cards.Name: Confusion (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: Discard a card from opponent s hand, deck or Reserve.

cards.Name: Death of Unrighteous (Roots)
cards.SpecialAbility: Discard all evil cards in battle to shuffle all cards in Land of Bondage.

cards.Name: Raiders' Camp [2023 - Seasonal]
cards.Identifier: [Fortress holds any # of captured human Heroes]
cards.SpecialAbility: F: If attacked, you may release contents to shuffle a Lost Soul. / EC: Capture a human in a territory, discard a Fortress or take an Artifact.

cards.Name: Tribute [2023 - Seasonal]
cards.SpecialAbility: You may discard this card to give a card in territory to opponent's territory. Protect that card from harm this turn.
